name: MyRecipes
overview:
MyRecipes.com features a collection of professionally-tested recipes online from food experts at magazines and cookbooks–including Cooking Light, Southern Living, Sunset, Coastal Living, Real Simple, and more.

Find the food you need for any occasion with our recipe finder. Easily refine your search with any of nearly 150 recipe categories. The site delivers all types of recipes, from decadent desserts and authentic cuisines to great-tasting healthy favorites with nutrition information that is reviewed by registered dietitians.

Save your favorite recipes.

Build and email your shopping lists.

Create and pass around menus for upcoming get-togethers.

Rate the recipes and discover new dishes from reviews.
